text: Creating a cusom rgb strip controller gave me a lot of experience with working with microcontrollers and working on getting my skills sharpened with C++. This is seen with a clock as well to show the time as well as change a certian color at a certian time.
This is a digital design lab from one of my classes as a 2nd year. i learned alot about gates and logic of creating a circut from scratch

This is a program that I use to get my music from youtube videos. I first get the list of url's from youtube by serching for them. After that my program will go thorugh each one and download a high quality mp3 version of the video. It has helped my problem with getting music for free!

This program is my custom email client. this gets my email from my gmail account. From there I can read it and delete it. This is useful when you have a limmited computer connection and you need to connect to your email quickly. Overall a good learning experience and getting my skills sharpened even more.
